data.name: Instruction
data.value: Enter the code displayed on your device.

data.name: MissingSubject
data.value: User authentication failed. Missing subject claim.

data.name: InvalidUserCode
data.value: The specified user code is not valid. Please make sure you typed it correctly.

data.value: The client application cannot be found.
